( Carnage: I must make this reply short, I am called back to my grandmother's home once again.)

* Dinobot looked over at Cyber Claw as he continued to hold the door open for Tavatron, not sure what to make of the situation.
He had just come back from a hunt with Tavatron and come into this room where there was a bot who seemed almost like him, the same voice and the same smalls...almost.
The scent of this stranger seemed so similar to his own but it also carried a bit of something else, something that set this stranger apart from being completely like himself. It was like a hormone that set the being off from him, the scent of it clearly distinguishing it from him...and he knew exactly what it was. This new bot, the one who almost seemed to be imitating him...was a female.
Dinobot growled deeply in the back of his throat as he took a step towards the stranger and away from the door after looking towards Tavatron with puzzlement,but then noticing Striker come between the stranger and himself with a question that he was wondering at the same moment.
He looked at Striker but then locked his optic on the new bot, even his laser guiding system ready to target the stranger if needed. His muscles were tense and his aggression was rising, he didn't like the fact that there was a female bot trying to seem like him.
He snarled.*

" Yes, explain."

* He looked over to Cyber Claw with his optics narrowed and his tail thrashing, he would like to hear what she had to say for herself because he knew that once he exposed her feminine origins she would have no place for error. But for now he wanted to hear what this new bot had to say, wanted to see what sort of lie she would make up to almost make him seem like he wasn't who he really was.
Dinobot crossed his arms but his tail continued to thrash,*

" This may prove most interesting."
